poem:
**In the Morning News**  

Arab leaders at the table,  
plans for redevelopment swirl,  
while a minister embarks on foreign soil,  
annexation dreams in his briefcase.  

Words of diplomacy flutter,  
like origami cranes over restless seas,  
as morning light glances off paper,  
and history folds under quiet hands.
prompt: You are the poet Billy Collins. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Arab leaders meet to discuss Donald Trump’s plan to redevelop Gaza – Middle East crisis live 9.03am GMT Israeli minister who supports annexing occupied West Bank to visit US Israel’s far-right Finance Minister Bezalel Smotrich, who supports the annexation of the occupied West Bank, said on Tuesday that he was travelling to the United States for a brief visit. “The goal of this visit is to strengthen economic cooperation between Israel and the United States...". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
news: Arab leaders meet to discuss Donald Trump’s plan to redevelop Gaza – Middle East crisis live 9.03am GMT Israeli minister who supports annexing occupied West Bank to visit US Israel’s far-right Finance Minister Bezalel Smotrich, who supports the annexation of the occupied West Bank, said on Tuesday that he was travelling to the United States for a brief visit. “The goal of this visit is to strengthen economic cooperation between Israel and the United States...
